changes.description: Comprehensive test method for Stats screen navigation verification

patterns_discovered.pattern: Multi-step UI testing with state capture
patterns_discovered.description: Tests follow a consistent pattern: capture initial state -> perform action -> verify new state

patterns_discovered.pattern: Widget tree analysis for screen verification
patterns_discovered.description: Uses widget tree text search to detect screen transitions and UI components
Tests use jsonrpc requests with sequential ID numbering and error checking

patterns_discovered.pattern: Selective verification with warnings vs failures
patterns_discovered.description: Distinguishes between critical failures (return False) and non-critical issues (print warning)

gotchas_discovered.description: Tests use multiple indicators and warnings instead of strict verification for UI components
gotchas_discovered.context: Stat card verification allows missing components without test failure

gotchas_discovered.description: Uses fixed 1-second sleep for UI transitions instead of dynamic waiting
Tests rely on specific key selectors ('statsButton', 'backButton', 'searchInput')
gotchas_discovered.context: Will break if app changes widget keys or structure

strengths: Multiple detection methods for screen verification
Includes back navigation and component verification
weaknesses: Fixed wait times may cause flakiness
No test data creation for realistic stats

recommendations.description: Replace hardcoded time.sleep() with proper wait conditions based on UI state changes
Create tasks to populate realistic data for stat verification instead of just checking component presence
Use multiple selectors and hierarchical widget paths instead of text search alone
Implement back button click and return to Home screen verification
